result.ga: Ghlac sé col leo ar an toirt
result.orig: Ghlac sé col leo ar an toirt
result.html: Ghlac sé col leo ar an toirtHe disliked them immediately.
result.ponchtml: Ġlac sé col leo ar an toirtHe disliked them immediately.

result.eng: He travelled to Afganistan in 1999 and accepted Osama Bin Laden's personal request that he would organize air attacks on America.
result.ga: Thaistil sé chun na hAfganastáine i 1999 agus ghlac le hiarratas pearsanta Osama Bin Laden go n-eagródh sé ionsaithe aeir i Meiriceá
result.orig: Thaistil sé chun na hAfganastáine i 1999 agus ghlac le hiarratas pearsanta Osama Bin Laden go n-eagródh sé ionsaithe aeir i Meiriceá
result.html: Thaistil sé chun na hAfganastáine i 1999 agus ghlac le hiarratas pearsanta Osama Bin Laden go n-eagródh sé ionsaithe aeir i MeiriceáHe travelled to Afganistan in 1999 and accepted Osama Bin Laden's personal request that he would organize air attacks on America.
result.ponchtml: Ṫaistil sé ċun na hAfganastáine i 1999 agus ġlac le hiarratas pearsanta Osama Bin Laden go n-eagróḋ sé ionsaiṫe aeir i MeiriceáHe travelled to Afganistan in 1999 and accepted Osama Bin Laden's personal request that he would organize air attacks on America.

result.eng: The Vikings took York in their possession in the year 867.
result.ga: Ghlac na Lochlannaigh seilbh ar Eabhrac sa bhliain 867
result.orig: Ghlac na Lochlannaigh seilbh ar Eabhrac sa bhliain 867
result.html: Ghlac na Lochlannaigh seilbh ar Eabhrac sa bhliain 867The Vikings took York in their possession in the year 867.
result.ponchtml: Ġlac na Loċlannaiġ seilḃ ar Eaḃrac sa ḃliain 867The Vikings took York in their possession in the year 867.

result.eng: She got hold of the microphone and started singing.
result.ga: Ghlac sí seilbh ar an micreafón agus thosaigh sí ag canadh
result.orig: Ghlac sí seilbh ar an micreafón agus thosaigh sí ag canadh
result.html: Ghlac sí seilbh ar an micreafón agus thosaigh sí ag canadhShe got hold of the microphone and started singing.
result.ponchtml: Ġlac sí seilḃ ar an micreafón agus ṫosaiġ sí ag canaḋShe got hold of the microphone and started singing.

result.eng: As the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ga: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.orig: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.html: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíochtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ponchtml: Mar a leaṫ an tír siar amaċ ṫáinig níos mó stáit isteaċ san aontaċt nár ġlac le scláḃaíoċtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
